content: The historical novel 'I, Claudius' written by Robert Graves tells the story of the life of which Roman Emperor?

The historical novel 'I, Claudius' written by Robert Graves tells the story of the life of Claudius, who was the fourth Roman Emperor. The novel is written in the form of an autobiography of Claudius, and it covers his early life, his rise to power, and his reign as emperor. The book is considered a classic of historical fiction and has been adapted into a successful BBC television series.
